message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's work together to make this happen.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final offer for now.
